channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Avirato hotels online booking engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Avirato hotels online booking engine

item.title: CVE-2023-0768|2024-08-02T05:24:34.533Z -- unknown -- avirato%20hotels%20online%20booking%20engine
item.description: The Avirato hotels online booking engine WordPress plugin through 5.0.5 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before using them in SQL statement/s, which could allow any authenticated users, such as subscriber to perform SQL Injection attacks.
